subject: Public Speaking
title: Oprah: Universal Human Experience
description: A 60-second lesson on Oprah: Universal Human Experience.

hook.text: Oprah rose from poverty to become one of America's most influential voices.

buildup.text: Her speeches connect personal stories to universal emotional truths.

discovery.text: She mastered vulnerability in public while maintaining authority.

twist.text: Her influence comes from making millions feel personally seen.

climax.text: Contemporary audiences crave authenticity. Oprah delivers it.

punchline.text: Speak your truth. Others recognize themselves.

quiz.question: What makes Oprah effective?
options: Personal stories connected to universal truths
